textBeforeTable: Track Listing Baltimore duo Alex Scally and Victoria Legrand (niece of film composer Michel Legrand) craft lulling, intricate ballads collaged from bits of guitar, organ, spare percussion, and Victoria’s haunting vocals. Their newest is another marvel of complexity disguised as simplicity. Each song slowly unfurls with the déjà vu and strangeness of a dream, or a walk through the woods at night. As smart and challenging as the latest stuff from Animal Collective or the Dirty Projectors, but far more minimal and naturalistic. 01/26/2010 Amoeba Review Download CD, Also available in: SHIPS FREE in U.S. $22.98 BUY Beach House Teen Dream (LP) Tweet Teen Dream (LP) Home View More
